basics.name: Engin OKSUZ
basics.label: Autonomous Driving Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am work on Autonomous Systems

work.name: HAVELSAN - Robotics and Autonomous Systems
highlights: Hands on experience with AD sensors (including Cameras, LIDAR, RADAR, GPS and IMU) and processing platforms
Perception Algorithms: sensor calibrations, development of algorithms for object detection, tracking, and , localization using LIDAR and camera data, drivable road segmentation, and classification.
Path Planning Algorithms: search-based planning algorithms (A*, D* Lite) and local_planner algorithms.
Developed and applied sensor fusion algorithms integrating data from LiDAR and cameras.
Design of autonomous vehicle software on the ROS1-2 platform and execution of simulation-based tests.
Distribution of autonomous vehicle software tailored to NVIDIA hardware (AGX, NX, etc.).
UAV Localization in GNSS-Denied Environments assisted by DL features extracted from satellite imagery.
Object Detection from UAV camera feed and localization of detected objects.
Algorithm development for data collection from UAV cameras using MAVROS and MAVSDK libraries.

work.name: Turkish Technlogy Team
highlights: I worked as a competition coordinator in technology competitions held in 35 different fields.
I managed website content and social media contents.

work.name: HARGEM
highlights: New generation high-speed wireless communication systems research and development studies.
Methods of Automatically Determining the Modulation Type of Communication Signals.

work.name: Gate Elektronik
highlights: Designed electronic circuits with necessary component selections
Tested developed cards through prepared software.
Implemented and trained computer vision models for object detection and image classification using TensorFlow and MobileSSD
Developed computer vision algorithms to detect and track objects of interest in video streams using OpenCV
